alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Lower Washington County; Salt Lake Valley; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 18 at 4:16AM MDT until June 18 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Salt Lake Valley, Tooele and Rush Valleys, Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, Southwest Utah, Lower Washington County and Western Millard and Juab Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing dust is expected across the area and may suddenly and significantly reduce visibility in some locations, including interstate highways.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. If dense dust is observed blowing across or approaching the roadway, pull your vehicle off the pavement as far as possible, stop, turn off lights and set the emergency brake. Do not keep your foot on the brake as this will illuminate tail lights. If you cannot leave the roadway, proceed at a lower speed and turn on lights.
